p: The effect of extract of Z. armatum fruit (ZAB) and isolated alkaloids (ZABA) was investigated for writhing response in mice and the results are tabulated in Table 3. It was found that both ZAB and ZABA caused a significant inhibition of writhing in mice at 300 mg/kg (36.49%, p > 0.05) and 100 mg/kg (38.53%, p > 0.001) dose-dependent inhibition on the writhing response in 10 min time.
